meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I can keep up in my education
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Nancy, a second-year student in the education major. I’ve been taking a lot of classes, from English to sociology to education studies. Some of them are interesting, but others are just really heavy and over my head. I’m struggling to keep up with grades, and I’m worried I’ll fall behind and lose interest. I’m also feeling frustrated by the content and the way it’s being presented. I’d love to talk about what I’m doing wrong and how to improve, but I don’t know how to ask for help or how to make progress in my major.
